name: ax-his2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, cva, c1), csp, c2), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(c1, csp, c2))))
comment: Distributive law for inner product. Postulate (S2) of [Beran] p. 95. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
